decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 21st June 2017 and numbered 2016/95-01, 2016/95-02, 2016/95-03 and 2016/95-04 therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the dwelling known as 59 Kingsley Avenue, Hounslow TW3 4AE and shall not be used as primary residential accommodation, for business purposes or as a separate dwelling.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to enlarge an existing outbuilding to the rear garden of the house
